programme.title: Trouble with the English Language
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke looks at the affect of poll ratings on presidential elections.
programme.medium_synopsis: In the run up to the presidential election Alistair Cooke considers the affect of the poll ratings, Governor Bush's language gaffs and personality contests.
